items.description: As a Software Engineer at SubscriptionPro, I have played a crucial role in developing a comprehensive SaaS platform for subscription management. I have contributed to all aspects of development, including architecture, database design, frontend, and backend.
Created professional and responsive websites for clients globally. Helped assist clients in redesigning their current websites using WordPress, Laravel to their complete satisfaction.

Strengthened the security of the school management system by fixing SQL injection, XSS, and CSRF. Incorporated new features to existing school management system using PHP & MySQL. Helped upgrade existing school management system into Laravel, Vue.js. Solved business challenges by developing scalable web applications using Laravel
